NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER 300 BASE 2005-2007 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER 300 BASE 2005-2007 2.7L/167

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (8 Pack) for CHRYSLER 300 C SRT8 2005-2010 6.1L/370

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V8, Engine Size 6.1L/370
  • Engine Family Mopar Hemi Gen III
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 8 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER 300 C SRT8 2005-2010 6.1L/370

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER 300 LX 2008-2009 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER 300 LX 2008-2009 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER 300 TOURING 2010-2010 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER 300 TOURING 2010-2010 2.7L/167

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER CONCORDE LX 1998-2004 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER CONCORDE LX 1998-2004 2.7L/167

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER CONCORDE LXI 1998-2001 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER CONCORDE LXI 1998-2001 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER PACIFICA BASE 2005-2007 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PACIFICA BASE 2005-2007 3.8L/230

  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER PACIFICA LX 2008-2008 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PACIFICA LX 2008-2008 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER CLASSIC 2001-2002 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER CLASSIC 2001-2002 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER CLASSIC 2005-2005 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER CLASSIC 2005-2005 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER DREAM 2002-2002 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER DREAM 2002-2002 2.4L/148

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER DREAM CRUISER 2005-2005 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER DREAM CRUISER 2005-2005 2.4L/148

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER GT 2003-2007 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER GT 2003-2007 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER LIMITED 2001-2009 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER LIMITED 2001-2009 2.4L/148

  • PayPal

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER LX 2008-2009 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER LX 2008-2009 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER STREET CRUISER 2005-2006 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER STREET CRUISER 2005-2006 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER PT CRUISER TOURING 2001-2009 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER PT CRUISER TOURING 2001-2009 2.4L/148

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING BASE 2004-2004 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING BASE 2004-2004 2.7L/167

  • PayPal

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING BASE 2004-2006 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING BASE 2004-2006 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING BASE 2007-2007 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING BASE 2007-2007 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING GTC 2002-2006 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING GTC 2002-2006 2.7L/167

  • PayPal

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LIMITED 2002-2006 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING LIMITED 2002-2006 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2003 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2003 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2004 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2001-2004 2.4L/148

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2009-2010 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING LX 2009-2010 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI 2001-2003 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI 2001-2003 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI LIMITED 2001-2001 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING LXI LIMITED 2001-2001 2.7L/167

  • PayPal

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.4L/148

  • PayPal

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING LX PLUS 2002-2002 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING TOURING 2004-2010 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING TOURING 2004-2010 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER SEBRING TSI 2005-2006 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER SEBRING TSI 2005-2006 2.7L/167

  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY BASE 2003-2007 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY BASE 2003-2007 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EL 2002-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EL 2002-2003 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EL 2002-2003 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EL 2002-2003 3.8L/230

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2001-2004 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2001-2004 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2003-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY EX 2003-2003 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2001-2007 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2001-2007 3.8L/230

  • PayPal
