  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2003-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2003-2003 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2005-2005 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LIMITED 2005-2005 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2001-2001 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2001-2001 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2002-2003 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2002-2003 3.8L/230

  • PayPal

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2003-2010 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2003-2010 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2005-2005 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LX 2005-2005 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LXI 2001-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LXI 2001-2003 3.3L/201

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LXI 2002-2003 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY LXI 2002-2003 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY TOURING 2004-2008 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY TOURING 2004-2008 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY TOURING 2005-2005 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY TOURING 2005-2005 3.3L/201

  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY TOURING 2009-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY TOURING 2009-2010 3.8L/231

  • PayPal

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY WALTER P. CHRYSLER SIGNATURE SERIES 2010-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY WALTER P. CHRYSLER SIGNATURE SERIES 2010-2010 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER VOYAGER BASE 2001-2002 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER VOYAGER BASE 2001-2002 2.4L/148

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER VOYAGER BASE 2001-2002 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER VOYAGER BASE 2001-2002 3.3L/201

  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for CHRYSLER VOYAGER LX 2001-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER VOYAGER LX 2001-2003 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for CHRYSLER VOYAGER LX 2002-2003 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    CHRYSLER VOYAGER LX 2002-2003 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE AVENGER R/T 2010-2010 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE AVENGER R/T 2010-2010 2.7L/167

  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE AVENGER SE 2008-2009 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE AVENGER SE 2008-2009 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE AVENGER SXT 2008-2010 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE AVENGER SXT 2008-2010 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CARAVAN BASE 2006-2007 3.3L/201

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE CARAVAN C/V 2003-2005 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CARAVAN C/V 2003-2005 3.3L/201

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for DODGE CARAVAN EC 2002-2002 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CARAVAN EC 2002-2002 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE CARAVAN SE 2001-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CARAVAN SE 2001-2003 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for DODGE CARAVAN SE 2001-2004 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CARAVAN SE 2001-2004 2.4L/148

  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE CARAVAN SE 2005-2007 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CARAVAN SE 2005-2007 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE CARAVAN SPORT 2001-2004 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CARAVAN SPORT 2001-2004 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE CARAVAN SXT 2004-2007 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CARAVAN SXT 2004-2007 3.3L/201

  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (8 Pack) for DODGE CHALLENGER SRT8 2008-2010 6.1L/370

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V8, Engine Size 6.1L/370
  • Engine Family Mopar Hemi Gen III
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 8 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CHALLENGER SRT8 2008-2010 6.1L/370

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE CHARGER BASE 2006-2007 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CHARGER BASE 2006-2007 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE CHARGER SE 2007-2010 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CHARGER SE 2007-2010 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (8 Pack) for DODGE CHARGER SRT8 2006-2010 6.1L/370

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V8, Engine Size 6.1L/370
  • Engine Family Mopar Hemi Gen III
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 8 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE CHARGER SRT8 2006-2010 6.1L/370

  • PayPal

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN ANNIVERSARY EDITION 2004-2004 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN ANNIVERSARY EDITION 2004-2004 3.8L/230

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN BASE 2003-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN BASE 2003-2003 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN C/V 2004-2005 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN C/V 2004-2005 3.3L/201

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN C/V 2008-2010 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN C/V 2008-2010 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN EL 2002-2002 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN EL 2002-2002 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.
