NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN EL 2002-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN EL 2002-2003 3.3L/201

  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN ES 2001-2002 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN ES 2001-2002 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN ES 2001-2003 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN ES 2001-2003 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN EX 2001-2004 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN EX 2001-2004 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN EX 2002-2002 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN EX 2002-2002 3.3L/201

  • PayPal

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SE 2001-2010 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SE 2001-2010 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SE 2002-2002 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SE 2002-2002 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SE PLUS 2005-2005 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SE PLUS 2005-2005 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SE PLUS 2005-2005 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SE PLUS 2005-2005 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SPORT 2001-2003 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SPORT 2001-2003 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SPORT 2001-2003 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SPORT 2001-2003 3.8L/230

  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SXT 2004-2008 3.8L/230

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/230
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SXT 2004-2008 3.8L/230

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SXT 2005-2005 3.3L/201

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.3L/201
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SXT 2005-2005 3.3L/201

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SXT 2009-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE GRAND CARAVAN SXT 2009-2010 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE INTREPID BASE 1998-2000 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE INTREPID BASE 1998-2000 2.7L/167

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE INTREPID ES 1998-2001 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE INTREPID ES 1998-2001 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE INTREPID R/T 2001-2001 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE INTREPID R/T 2001-2001 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE INTREPID SE 2001-2004 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE INTREPID SE 2001-2004 2.7L/167

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE MAGNUM SE 2005-2008 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE MAGNUM SE 2005-2008 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (8 Pack) for DODGE MAGNUM SRT8 2006-2008 6.1L/370

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V8, Engine Size 6.1L/370
  • Engine Family Mopar Hemi Gen III
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 8 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE MAGNUM SRT8 2006-2008 6.1L/370

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for DODGE NEON SRT-4 2003-2005 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE NEON SRT-4 2003-2005 2.4L/148

  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS ES 2001-2003 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS ES 2001-2003 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS ES 2001-2004 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS ES 2001-2004 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS R/T 2002-2006 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS R/T 2002-2006 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS SE 2001-2004 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS SE 2001-2004 2.4L/148

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS SE 2001-2004 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS SE 2001-2004 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS SE PLUS 2002-2002 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS SE PLUS 2002-2002 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS SE PLUS 2002-2002 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS SE PLUS 2002-2002 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS SXT 2003-2003 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS SXT 2003-2003 2.7L/167

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (4 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS SXT 2003-2006 2.4L/148

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine L4, Engine Size 2.4L/148
  • Engine Family Mopar 4-cylinder
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 4 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS SXT 2003-2006 2.4L/148

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for DODGE STRATUS SXT 2005-2006 2.7L/167

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 2.7L/167
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE STRATUS SXT 2005-2006 2.7L/167

  • PayPal

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (10 Pack) for DODGE VIPER SRT-10 2008-2010 8.4L/515

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V10, Engine Size 8.4L/515
  • Engine Family Mopar V10
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 10 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE VIPER SRT-10 2008-2010 8.4L/515

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (10 Pack) for DODGE VIPER SRT-10 ACR 2008-2010 8.4L/515

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V10, Engine Size 8.4L/515
  • Engine Family Mopar V10
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 10 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    DODGE VIPER SRT-10 ACR 2008-2010 8.4L/515

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (8 Pack) for JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE SRT8 2006-2010 6.1L/370

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V8, Engine Size 6.1L/370
  • Engine Family Mopar Hemi Gen III
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 8 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE SRT8 2006-2010 6.1L/370

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231

  • PayPal

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.
