NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER MOUNTAIN 2010-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER MOUNTAIN 2010-2010 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER RUBICON 2007-2011 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER RUBICON 2007-2011 3.8L/231

  • PayPal

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED 70TH ANNIVERSARY 2011-2011 3.8L/231

  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED ISLANDER 2010-2010 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED MOUNTAIN 2010-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED MOUNTAIN 2010-2010 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED RUBICON 2007-2011 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED RUBICON 2007-2011 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SAHARA 2007-2011 3.8L/231

  • PayPal

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED SPORT 2010-2011 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED X 2007-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER UNLIMITED X 2007-2010 3.8L/231

We accept the following:

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for JEEP WRANGLER X 2007-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    JEEP WRANGLER X 2007-2010 3.8L/231

  • PayPal
  • All Major Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express,Discover)

  • Shipping and Handling Charges Are Free unless specified in the listing.
  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for VOLKSWAGEN ROUTAN S 2009-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    VOLKSWAGEN ROUTAN S 2009-2010 3.8L/231

  • PayPal

  • Hawaii and Alaska orders will have an increase in shipping costs.

  • **We will notify you if there is an increase in the shipping charge or in your order prior to billing andshipping**.

  • Shipment Carrier: Most of our packages are shipped via Fedex and USPS.
  • International Shipments, APO/FPO, P.O. Boxes and shipments to Alaska and Hawaii will be shipped via USPS.
  • If a special shipping method is required please send us a message and we will do our best to help you out.

  • **We have the right to change the carrier under certain circumstances**

  • Delivery Time: Allow 3-5 business days for delivery items in the continental United States. Allow additional time for shipments to Alaska and Hawaii.

NGK G-Power Platinum Spark Plug LZTR5AGP (6 Pack) for VOLKSWAGEN ROUTAN SE 2009-2010 3.8L/231

Product Description

Description

    These G-Power Platinum spark plugs deliver the power and quality that you expect from NGK. The fine pure-platinum electrode tip remains virtually unchanged and reaches self-cleaning temperatures to deliver longer durability and optimum performance. Compared to conventional plugs, G-Power plugs deliver better starts, superior acceleration, and greater fuel economy. Shorty Spark Plug: No. Resistor: Yes. Manufacturer Heat Range: 5. Electrode Tip Material: Platinum. Electrode Core Material: Copper. Insulator Type: Projected. Spark Plug Thread Size: 14mm. Spark Plug Reach: 0.984 in. Spark Plug Seat Style: Tapered. Wrench Diameter: 5/8 in. Ground Strap Quantity: One

FEATURES

  • Engine V6, Engine Size 3.8L/231
  • Engine Family Mopar V6
  • Trivalent metal plating provides superior anti-corrosion and anti-seizing properties. Corrugated ribs prevent flashover. Trapezoid cut ground electrode reduces quenching.
  • Copper core aids in heat removal. Triple seals prevent leakage. Pure alumina silicate ceramic insulator, provides superior strength and better heat transfer. Fine wire platinum tipped center electrode reduces required voltage for better starts, superior acceleration and increased fuel economy
  • Sold In 6 Pack
    •

FITMENT

    VOLKSWAGEN ROUTAN SE 2009-2010 3.8L/231
